alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 14 at 11:39AM PST until February 16 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected through Tuesday morning before shifting north. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes including Aspendell. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and strong crosswind can impact local roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Primary impacts will occur overnight with the westerly downslope winds expected to work from the mid to lower slopes and possibly down to the US-395 corridor. A transition to northerly winds is expected Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
